wikipedia_page.main: John Douglas Algernon Langley (25 April 1918 – 27 April 1996) was an English first-class cricketer active 1937–39 who played for Middlesex and Cambridge University. He was born in Northwood; died in Westminster.

response: John Langley (1943–2021) was an American television and film director.
John Langley may also refer to:
*John Langley (MP for Gloucestershire), MP for Gloucestershire 1429,1432,1435–1447
*John Langley (rugby league), rugby league footballer of the 1960s and 1970s
*John Langley, English musician, member of The Blue Aeroplanes
